main: Refael... I'd thought I sensed your uncleanness nearby.
I concur. Your remnant must have failed you woefully for there to still be a living King of Hell.
The winged demon smiles from ear to ear, tilting her head.
It's been a while, Azi. Did you miss me?
No. You've given me the gift of getting to turn you to ash before I die.
You never cease to amuse. And you, my darling Momiji.
Even a mutt like you will be welcome in my new world, provided you behave, of course.
You will be changed beyond recognition, but you will be made beautiful. Like me.
